entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CarouselView not working properly in MacCatalyst #14046
  • MAUI Blazor. Publish iOS. Can not create an IOS archive. Code object is not signed at all. In subcomponent. SQLLitePCLRaw.lib.e_sqllite.ios.aotdata.arm64 #14044
  • [iOS] After lower positioned text entry item selected and scrolled, you can't scroll back to it. #14043
  • [iOS] Page Contents shift down when using Prompt with input field. #14041

Closed

  • .NET 8 Feature Request: Support Blazor Hybrid on Linux/Ubuntu #11738
    .NET 8 Planning
  • MAUI App is there any tool from Microsoft which supports MAUI GUI Automation? #11650
    Backlog
  • Blazor Maui : "<audio />" tag doesn't show screen lock notification on Android #11675
  • Infrared sensor #11322
    Backlog
  • Publish Maui app as exe not work on window 10 - continue #11254
  • Add interface for Microsoft.Maui.Essentials.MainThread #11054
    Backlog
  • Checklist for win-arm64 support #11090
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • TextCell isVisible #11120
    Backlog
  • .NET MAUI Maps custom object in map Pin #9909
    Backlog
  • MAUI equivalent to Xamarin.Azure.NotificationHubs.iOS for iOS push notifications #10330
    Backlog
  • MAUI 17.4pr1, Markup extension cause debugger fail to attach #10081
    Backlog
  • Control Templates do not have a way to access elements in Control Templates #9817
    Backlog
  • OpenGLView is not available #9623
    Backlog
  • Reusable / extendable version of SecureStorage? (and for that matter - other relevant packages as well) #9276
    Backlog
  • Add iOS native library #8679
  • Android Picker (Theme Change BackgroundColor wont Update) Bug #8437
  • ToPlatformException in MauiCustomRenderer sample app #7999
  • VS does not always show compile time errors of MAUI app #7061
  • Tried to get a simple expander view to work. Works fine on Android but not on Windows #6632
    Backlog
  • Add license headers to source files. #5978
  • Failure to initialize App MainPage on startup after updating to RC1 #6063
    Backlog
  • Add an overloaded constructor for the requested types to simplify things #4831
    Backlog
  • Unable to use ONNX: Reference to type 'ReadOnlySpan<>' claims it is defined in 'mscorlib', but it could not be found #5078
    Backlog
  • Views Don't Support RightToLeft Layout #4245
    Backlog
  • ProgressBar, add three fields #3890
    Backlog
  • MAUI template does not available on visual studio 2022 for mac #14017

PullRequests

Merged

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #14040
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net8.0] Update extensions versions #14010
    area/upstream, dependencies
  • [vs-workload] Remove @(MultiTargetPackNames) #14031

Updated

  • [net7.0] Removing skip attribute from color validation tests #14020
  • Implement touch interception for layouts on Android #13725
  • Bump WASDK and BuildTools #13687
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, dependencies
